{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = CUJO A0001 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Smart Internet Firewall |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = CUJO |model = Smart Firewall |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A0001 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = firewall |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 5002-1307 REVD |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 5002-1307 REVD |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN7020; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 64 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1 / 1.2 GHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Cypress;CY8C4124AXI-443; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = ARM |cpu2_type_rev = Cortex-M0 |cpu2spd = 24 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC04G-S100; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Cypress;CY8C4124AXI-443;onchip; |flash2size = 16 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;D2516EC4BXGGB; |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 4 KiB |ram2chip = Cypress;CY8C4124AXI-443;onchip; |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Vitesse;VSC8514-11; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, heatsink |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 03/31/2021 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2016 |estprice = 249 |upc = 853296007020 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B017B53DLY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "CUJO", "5/3/16" and "5002-1307 REVD" :are silkscreened on the board top
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7020 Dual-core [[MIPS64]] @1.0GHz *PSoC: [[Cypress]] CY8C4124AXI ARM (Cortex-M0) @24MHz *Storage: 4GB (eMMC 5.1) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power Source: 5V 2A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:CUJO A0001 01.jpg| File:CUJO A0001 02.jpg| File:CUJO A0001 03.jpg| File:CUJO A0001 04.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:CUJO Smart Firewall Top.jpeg|Board Top File:CUJO Smart Firewall Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:CUJO Smart Firewall LED Board Top.jpeg|PoE Board Top File:CUJO Smart Firewall LED Board Bottom.jpeg|PoE Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
